AMECard.Name: Face Detection
AMECard.Definition: Determine if there are one or more regions showing (part of) a human face, and report their approximate boundaries.

Input.Name: StructuredRegionOfInterest
Input.Definition: A region in which to perform the detection.

Input.Name: MinimumSize
Input.Definition: The minimum size of faces to be detected in pixels.

Input.Name: MaximumSize
Input.Definition: The maximum size of faces to be detected in pixels.

Input.Name: ModelToUse
Input.Definition: The model for detection to use, if applicable (e.g., force use of frontal or lateral models only).

Output.Name: Detection
Output.Comment: The output regions where faces have been detected
